work_experience.description: Designed and implemented scalable architectures for a high-availability financial system. Researched and applied best practices to ensure maintainability and resilience.
Developed responsive e-commerce applications using React.js, focusing on user-friendly interfaces and collaboration with the design team.

projects.name: SmartGardener
projects.description: A fullstack web application for managing your plants. Implemented with React.js and Node.js. Features include plant database, watering reminders, and plant care tips. Deployed on Heroku. Offers rich UI/UX experience. Also available via API.

projects.name: CI/CD Pipeline
projects.description: Implemented complete CI/CD pipeline for a web application.

projects.name: HomeFinApp
projects.description: A web application for managing personal finances. Features include budget tracking, expense categorization, financial reports, analyzing receipts, and setting financial goals. WIP. For now functional backend, work extensively on beautiful frontend.

cv.about_me: Experienced Fullstack Developer with a background in Computer Science. Skilled in JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Node.js, CI/CD, npm, yarn, Webpack, and Babel. Strong problem-solving and communication skills. Passionate about developing modern financial systems with high availability and resilience.

supplement.review:
{  
  "improvement_suggestions": [
    "Consider adding a professional summary or objective statement at the top of your CV to highlight your most significant achievements and qualifications, tailoring it to the specific job description.",
    "Emphasize relevant technical skills by including a separate section for them. If you have certifications, licenses, or training that are relevant to the job, make sure to include those as well.",
    "Quantify your achievements wherever possible. Instead of saying 'increased sales by 25%', say 'increased sales by 25% in one quarter'. This will help demonstrate the impact of your work and make it easier for hiring managers to visualize your accomplishments.",
    "Tailor your education section to highlight relevant coursework, projects, or research experience that aligns with the job requirements. Consider including relevant professional certifications, training programs, or workshops.",
    "Be concise but detailed in your work experience section. Focus on achievements and results rather than just listing job responsibilities. Use bullet points and action verbs like 'managed', 'created', 'developed' to make it easy to scan and understand your accomplishments.",
    "Use keywords from the job description throughout your CV, especially in your summary, skills section, and work experience. This will help your application pass through applicant tracking systems (ATS) and catch the eye of hiring managers.",
    "Proofread multiple times for grammar, spelling, and formatting errors. A single mistake can make a negative impression and hurt your chances of getting hired."
  ]
}
